ImTOO DVD Creator:
Frustrated at not being able to convert and burn your favorite clips onto a DVD disk because it is not compatible? Want to make the videos taken by iPhone 4 into DVD movie? ImTOO DVD Creator is your solution. Feature-rich DVD-burning software, ImTOO DVD Creator can convert and burn different video formats (even HD) such as AVI, MPEG, DivX, MKV, MP4, and WMV to DVD movies, as well as create DVD folders and ISO images from them.

ImTOO DVD Creator also features a range of powerful DVD authoring functions for making customized DVDs such as creating personalized DVD menus, clip video segments, add soundtracks and subtitles to DVDs, as well as editing video effects. With support for multithreading and multi-core processing, ImTOO DVD Creator can convert any file even several files within moments. Download ImTOO DVD Creator for FREE now!

-Create DVD movies from videos in HD video formats (MKV, TS, MOV, MTS, M2TS).
-Multitask processed at one conversion.
-Burn common SD video formats to DVD (incl. WMV to DVD, AVI to DVD, MPEG to DVD, MP4 to DVD).
-Create DVD folders & ISO image file from different video formats.
-DVD authoring & customization: create DVD menus, clip video segments, add soundtrack/subtitles, edit effects plus more.
-Trim video to cut the unuseful part such as the black frame.
-Multithreading & Multi-Core Processing for maximum conversion speed.
-Supports DVD-R, DVD-RW, DVD+R, DVD+RW, DVD+R DL & DVD-R DL.
-Create DVD movies from MOV videos taken by iPhone 4/iPhone 4S, all kind of smart phone and DV to share those amazing moments with friends and family.
